text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends @CNN No one gives a whomp about TV ratings you stuttering dotard.  How about some facts and figures about how many soldiers were killed because you're a fetid dumpster fire?  How about we discuss the increase in covid-19 cases across the south because you refuse to advocate safety?
